name: Crusader Crash
description: Inspired by great titles such as Ghosts 'n Goblins and Mega Man 2 comes Crusader Crash! A fast paced, challenging, side-scrolling game with retro art and soundtracks! Play through 8 vastly different stages each with their own boss that will put your skills to the test!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6098P Processor or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon™ HD 7300M, GeForce 7800 GTX or higher Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: ASUS Xonar DG 5.1 or Higher
